column5: According to Canada AM this morning, we're forecast to be the warmest spot in northern Ontario today.  We're supposed to hit a high of 20 today and 21 tomorrow.  What a treat!
Might get that ice receding ! They're still walking on it in Temagami as of yesterday!
Weather in the Sudbury area is looking great for the next four days. Gotta get out and enjoy before bug season starts.

I think Spring has finally arrived! Unfortunately so has the Flu! My Son woke up shortly after midnight and decorated his bed with his dinner...I had been hoping to take him  out fishing tomorrow! Oh, well. I imagine we'll all get it here now, yippee!

I looked at a couple of the local lakes yesterday and I don't think I'd be walking on them.  They're awful black and punky looking with some spots starting to open.
